smallMoleculeLabBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of small molecule used in the experiment.
smallMoleculeLabBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

smallMoleculeSmilesBatch.description: SMILES representation only as provided from the vendor; full structure with all information, i.e. isomeric SMILES
smallMoleculeSmilesBatch.title: Small Molecule Vendor-provided SMILES

smallMoleculeProviderName.description: Vendor or lab that supplied the small molecule
smallMoleculeProviderName.title: Small Molecule Provider Name

smallMoleculeProviderCatalogId.description: ID or catalogue number assigned by the vendor or provider to the small molecule
smallMoleculeProviderCatalogId.title: Small Molecule Provider Catalog ID

smallMoleculeProviderBatchId.description: SMILES representation only as provided from the vendor; full structure with all information, i.e. isomeric SMILES
smallMoleculeProviderBatchId.title: Small Molecule Vendor-provided SMILES

smallMoleculeName.description: The common, primary, recognizable name for the small molecule being used.
smallMoleculeName.title: Small Molecule Name

smallMoleculeAlternativeNames.description: List of synonymous compound names, drug name (if applicable), and other alternative names
smallMoleculeAlternativeNames.title: Small Molecule Alternative Names

smallMoleculeLabCanonicalId.description: Lab-specific ID for the small molecule compound
smallMoleculeLabCanonicalId.title: Small Molecule Lab Canonical ID

smallMoleculeLincsId.description: The global LINCS ID of the small molecule for cross-reference to the LINCS project
smallMoleculeLincsId.title: Small Molecule LINCS ID

smallMoleculePubChemCid.description: CID that corresponds to the standardized parent compound in NCBIs PubChem database
smallMoleculePubChemCid.title: Small Molecule PubChem CID

smallMoleculeChebiId.description: ChEBI ID of the small molecule
smallMoleculeChebiId.title: Small Molecule ChEBI ID

smallMoleculeSmilesParent.description: Canonical isomeric SMILES representation of parent (standardized) chemical structure
smallMoleculeSmilesParent.title: Small Molecule Canonical SMILES

name.description: Name for the batch of small molecule used in the experiment.
name.title: Small Molecule Batch Name

description.description: Please include a description or any other helpful comments or annotations for the small molecule.
description.title: Description
